mush.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: an unpleasant soft substance, especially food, which is partly liquid and partly solid
mush.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The boiled vegetables had turned to mush.
She trudged through the mush of fallen leaves.
mush.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a thick porridge made from cornmeal
mush.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a book, film etc that is about love and is sentimental
mush.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: used to speak to someone in an angry way
mush.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Oi, mush! Get your hands off my car!
mush.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: I didn’t want to see his ugly mush ever again.
mush.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: used to tell a team of dogs that pull a sledge over snow to start moving
